## Plot

A plot of the relationship between miles per gallon as a function of the weight of a vehicle

```{r , echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)
data(mtcars)
```

```{r , echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
plot_ly(mtcars,x=mtcars$wt,y=mtcars$mpg,mode="markers",color=mtcars$wt,width=800,height=300)

```
